<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Neutralize Poison](/Spells.aspx?ID=207)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 354 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You pour healing magic through the target in an attempt to cure one poison afflicting it. Attempt a counteract check against the poison.
